oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:title: Discussion - Audio Architects of the Nashville Sound - 2014-06-01
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:description: Discussion hosted by the Nashville Chapter of the Audio Engineering Society paying tribute to the city’s recording pioneers. Participants include audio engineers Charlie Bragg, Jimmy Lockert, Al Pachuki, Neil Wilburn, Ernie Winfrey, and mastering engineer Mac Evans. This program will honor them by presenting them with the AES Nashville Lifetime Achievement Award from the Ford Theater at the Country Music Hall of Fame and Museum on June 1, 2014.
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dc:creator: Charlie Bragg; Jimmy Lockert; Al Pachuki; Neil Wilburn; Ernie Winfrey; Mac Evans; Harold Bradley;
oai_qdc:qualifieddc.dcterms:tableOfContents: Discussion moderated by Michael Janas. Included audio from video and selected recorded excerpts and presentation of the AES Nashville Lifetime Achievement award.
